did.origination: Duretec, Kresimir; Kulmukhametov, Artur; Kraxner, Michael; Plangg, Markus; Becker, Christoph; Faria, Lu√≠s

scopecontent.p: Continuous activities such as preservation monitoring, planning and operations, including the provisioning of access mechanisms or the creation of derivatives through migration, are needed to enable continuous access to content across evolving technological contexts without affecting the authenticity of digital objects. This article describes the SCAPE preservation suite, a loosely coupled set of systems and open APIs that facilitate scalable content profiling, monitoring, planning and workflow execution.
